answers.hobbies: I'm obsessed with vintage mechanical keyboards and building custom audio equipment. My weekends disappear into soldering tiny components and debugging circuit boards. I also brew my own kombucha experiments.
answers.study_work: The elegant beauty of clean code and well-designed systems. There's something almost meditative about refactoring a complex problem into something simple and maintainable.
answers.mistake: I spent three months building a perfect solution to a problem that didn't really need solving. It taught me that done is better than perfect, and that listening to users matters more than technical elegance.
answers.beyond_title: An introvert who speaks fluent in semicolons and thinks in algorithms
